name: Emlyn Bolton
body:
### Welcome to my site
I'm an experienced iOS developer, with a wide breadth of experience from CoreData to AVFoundation and CoreGraphics. 
My background is primarily in mobile development and began with the Symbian OS over ten years ago.

You'll find details of my more recent mobile work below.


### Projects
Some of the public work that I've contributed to includes the [Nike Golf 360 app](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/nike-golf-360/id527331403?mt=8)
There's a good description of the first version of the app [here](http://imogenkelly.com/#/nike-golf-ng360/4566966485).
Version two re-wrote the UI layer to what it is today and much of the custom controls and layout are the efforts of my labour.


More projects as they become non-NDA'd!



### Need help with something?
If you're interested a project for iOS, drop me a line on [linked in](http://ca.linkedin.com/in/emlynbolton/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
